function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Collection of GPS and personal data by Bluetooth-based apps","Impact":"Privacy concerns and potential misuse of data","Mitigation":"Strict regulations and data protection laws, transparent data usage policies","Technologies":"Encryption, anonymization, and secure data storage","People":"Individuals using the apps, general public","Owner":"Government, app developers"},{"Description":"Large-scale tracing of infected individuals using smart technologies","Impact":"Potential invasion of privacy and misuse of personal data","Mitigation":"Clear guidelines and regulations on data usage, informed consent from individuals","Technologies":"Data anonymization, digital surveillance tools, secure data sharing protocols","People":"Infected individuals, individuals with close contacts, general public","Owner":"Government, public health authorities"},{"Description":"Enforcement of strict quarantine measures through tracing and monitoring apps","Impact":"Infringement of personal liberties and potential misuse of personal data","Mitigation":"Transparency in data collection and usage, oversight by independent regulatory bodies","Technologies":"Remote monitoring, geolocation tracking, secure data transmission","People":"Individuals under quarantine, general public","Owner":"Government, public health agencies"}]}
